Articles.Content:
Project BABYLON

--- Sustainable colony on surface of Laythe ---

Our crew is working tirelessly to make Laythe in Joolian system their new home. WeÃ‚Â´ve had successfully established orbital stations above both Kerbin and Laythe, weÃ‚Â´ve working communication system and our mobile base has (crash)landed on Laythe. Now the real adventure begins!

What are our goals at this point:

- begin exploration of Laythe

- landing on and exploring other bodies for future mining ventures

What we need:

- reusable low gravity world lander

- rovers for Laythe

- RCS hovecrafts for low gravity worlds

- colony buildings for Laythe

- boats for Laythe

- jet powered dropship for Laythe

Bear in mind that all crafts must be stock!

If you want to submint your craft, write down some basic info, include a picture etc... Also youÃ‚Â´ll have to come up with way how to get your craft to Laythe - either by using ship in existing save file you can download from a link in my signature or from topic in mission reports or you can create your own ascent stage.

Also you can submint for delivering your craft to colony as a official mission of Project BABYLON.

Edited May 23, 2013 by Tada
